description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Dominate the System around Epsilon and dominate the other players in this fast paced Strategy Game. Choose from 4 different game modes. Become a World Starter, the top Space Miner, the Best Conquerer or Top Defender. Each mode provides a different style and strategy for playing the game. Take over planets, amass wealth, oust Pirates or be the first to find the Terra Module.
